content: black single_crochet each single_crochet around slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet chain 1 12 sts r9-10 in grey single_crochet each single_crochet around slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet chain 1 12 sts r11-12 in black single_crochet each single_crochet around slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet chain 1 12 sts r13-14 in grey single_crochet each single_crochet around slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet chain 1 12 sts r15-16 in black single_crochet each single_crochet around slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet chain 1 12 sts r17-18 in grey single_crochet each single_crochet around slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet chain 1 12 sts r19-20 in black single_crochet each single_crochet around slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet chain 1 12 sts cut black yarn and work in or leave behind work continue working r17-r19 in grey r17 single_crochet each single_crochet around slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet chain 1 12 sts r18 single_crochet each single_crochet around do not slip_stitch to join but continue on to r19 in the round 12 sts r19 slip_stitch in next 3 single_crochet single_crochet next 6 single_crochet slip_stitch in next single_crochet leave the remaining 3 single_crochet unworked 12 sts fo and leave a long tail for sewing stuff and brush entire tail with wire or pet slicker brush head in white and grey r1 in white chain 2 8sc in 2nd chain from hook later we will be inserting the safety nose thru the hole in the center you can also do a magic circle if you won t be using a safety nose r2 single_crochet each single_crochet around 8 sts r3 - 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet around 12 sts r4 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet around 16 sts r5 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet x4 single_crochet in remaining 8 single_crochet 20 sts r6 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet x4 single_crochet in remaining 8 single_crochet 24 sts r7 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet x4 single_crochet in remaining 8 single_crochet 28 sts r8 single_crochet each single_crochet around 28 sts r9 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet x4 single_crochet in remaining 7 single_crochet slip_stitch in last single_crochet 32 sts switch color to grey for remainder of the head r10 single_crochet each single_crochet around 32 sts r11 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet x4 single_crochet in remaining 8 single_crochet 36 sts r12 single_crochet each single_crochet around 36 sts r13 inv decrease in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet x4 single_crochet in remaining 8 single_crochet 32 sts r14 inv decrease in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet x4 single_crochet in remaining 8 single_crochet 28 sts r15 inv decrease in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet x4 single_crochet in remaining 7 single_crochet slip_stitch in last single_crochet 24 sts fo leaving long tail for sewing eye patches make 2 in black r1 chain 2 8sc in 2nd chain from hook safety eyes will be inserted thru the hole in the center you can also do a magic_ring
